TopicTitle: Is there a way i can go back to .20? Carreer mode not finished.

Articles.Content:
I would like to go back to .20 But thus .23 was released and i did the next stable release and i' got this feeling it's going to be .22

Is there a way to go back to .20 if my feeling is right? My career mode save wasn't finished

Edited January 6, 2014 by ThatKerbal
What do you mean by "go back"? You could always start a new game in an older version, but you'll have problems trying to carry over ship designs or save files to older versions.
Oh okay, But what i meant is like downgrade from 23 to 20.
I'm sorry, but I still don't understand what you're trying to do. There isn't an anti-patcher which will change the version of your game to an older one, if that's what you mean.
If you don't want to play career mode, set it to sandbox mode when you start a new save.
